scripts.copy: rm -rf .\public\assets && mkdirp public/assets && cp node_modules/@luigi-project/container/bundle.js node_modules/@luigi-project/core/*.* node_modules/@luigi-project/client/*.js node_modules/@sap-theming/theming-base-content/content/Base/baseLib/sap_fiori_3/css_variables.css public/assets/
scripts.dev: npm run copy && npm run serve
